movie.title: Deadpool
movie.actors: Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer
movie.plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 27 wins & 73 nominations.
